message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has immense potential value. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm willing to offer you a special price of $1000000 for it. This is a significant discount from its true value. I'm sure you'll agree this is a fantastic opportunity. What do you say?
